{"id":526749455,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1626988788,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/526749455/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"5.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) \n    {\n        double ans = 1;\n        long nn = abs(n);\n        while(nn > 0) {\n            if((nn&1)==1) \n                ans *= x;\n            \n            nn >>= 1;\n            x *= x;\n        }\n        \n        if(n<0)\n            return 1/ans;\n        else\n            return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
